languages.text: {n}Бровь инквизитора уважительно поднимается.{/n} "Из Комморры? Подвиг, который удавался немногим. Действительно, поздравляю вас с этим выдающимся свершением, и даже не нарушу торжественность момента уведомлением, что Инквизиция, конечно же, будет пристально наблюдать за вами. Искренне надеюсь, что ваш побег не был частью их коварной манипуляции".

{n}The Inquisitor raises an eyebrow, impressed.{/n} "You escaped from the Dark City? A feat that few have accomplished. Truly, I congratulate you on an exceptional performance, and I won't even mar your triumph by telling you that the Inquisition will, of course, be watching you very closely henceforth. I sincerely hope that your grand escape was not part of the xenos' devious machinations."
languages.original_text: {n}Бровь инквизитора уважительно поднимается.{/n} "Из Комморры? Подвиг, который удавался немногим. Действительно, поздравляю вас с этим выдающимся свершением, и даже не нарушу торжественность момента уведомлением, что Инквизиция, конечно же, будет пристально наблюдать за вами. Искренне надеюсь, что ваш побег не был частью их коварной манипуляции".

languages.text: {n}大审判官扬起了眉毛，看起来大吃一惊。{/n}“你竟然从黑暗之城逃了出来？恐怕没几个人能完成这样的伟业。老实说，我真的要祝贺你非凡的功绩。我甚至都不愿告诉你，审判庭今后会密切关注你，以免扫了你的兴致。我衷心希望，你的胜利逃亡并不是那些异形阴谋诡计的其中一环。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor raises an eyebrow, impressed.{/n} "You escaped from the Dark City? A feat that few have accomplished. Truly, I congratulate you on an exceptional performance, and I won't even mar your triumph by telling you that the Inquisition will, of course, be watching you very closely henceforth. I sincerely hope that your grand escape was not part of the xenos' devious machinations."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长扬起了眉毛，看起来大吃一惊。{/n}“你竟然从科摩罗逃了出来？恐怕没几个人能完成这样的伟业。老实说，我真的要祝贺你非凡的功绩。我甚至都不愿告诉你，审判庭今后会密切关注你，以免扫了你的兴致。我衷心希望，你的胜利逃亡并不是那些异形阴谋诡计的其中一环。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}El Inquisidor, impresionado, arquea una ceja.{/n} «¿Ha logrado escapar de la Ciudad Siniestra? Muy pocos pueden afirmar lo mismo. Le felicito sinceramente por una gesta excepcional y espero que no le moleste que le informe de que la Inquisición, naturalmente, estará vigilando sus acciones con mucha atención. Espero de corazón que su gran evasión no sea parte de un complot xenos».
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor raises an eyebrow, impressed.{/n} "You escaped from the Dark City? A feat that few have accomplished. Truly, I congratulate you on an exceptional performance, and I won't even mar your triumph by telling you that the Inquisition will, of course, be watching you very closely henceforth. I sincerely hope that your grand escape was not part of the xenos' devious machinations."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Inquisidor, impresionado, arquea una ceja.{/n} «¿Ha logrado escapar de Commorragh? Muy pocos pueden afirmar lo mismo. Le felicito sinceramente por una gesta excepcional y espero que no le moleste que le informe de que la Inquisición, naturalmente, estará vigilando sus acciones con mucha atención. Espero de corazón que su gran evasión no sea parte de un complot xenos».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}異端審問官は片眉を上げて感嘆を示す。{/n}「仄暗き都から脱出しただと？成し遂げた者が滅多にいない偉業だ。卓越した実力に心より祝辞を述べよう。異端審問庁は今よりお前を入念に監視するつもりであることは伝えるが、もちろんその偉業を腐す意図はない。お前の偉大な脱出劇が、異種族による巧妙な陰謀の一部ではなかったことを心から願っている」
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor raises an eyebrow, impressed.{/n} "You escaped from the Dark City? A feat that few have accomplished. Truly, I congratulate you on an exceptional performance, and I won't even mar your triumph by telling you that the Inquisition will, of course, be watching you very closely henceforth. I sincerely hope that your grand escape was not part of the xenos' devious machinations."

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問官は片眉を上げて感嘆を示す。{/n}「仄暗き都から脱出しただと？成し遂げた者が滅多にいない偉業だ。卓越した実力に心より祝辞を述べよう。異端審問庁は今よりお前を入念に監視するつもりであることは伝えるが、もちろんその偉業を腐す意図はない。お前の偉大な脱出劇が、異種族による巧妙な陰謀の一部ではなかったことを心から願っている」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}L'inquisiteur lève un sourcil, impressionné.{/n} « Vous vous êtes {mf|échappé|échappée} de la Cité Crépusculaire ? C'est un exploit rare. Je vous félicite sincèrement pour cette prouesse hors du commun et je n'entacherai pas votre triomphe en vous expliquant que l'Inquisition vous tiendra bien entendu à l'œil à compter de ce jour. J'espère de tout cœur que votre grande évasion ne faisait pas partie du plan diabolique des xénos. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor raises an eyebrow, impressed.{/n} "You escaped from the Dark City? A feat that few have accomplished. Truly, I congratulate you on an exceptional performance, and I won't even mar your triumph by telling you that the Inquisition will, of course, be watching you very closely henceforth. I sincerely hope that your grand escape was not part of the xenos' devious machinations."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'Inquisiteur lève un sourcil, impressionné.{/n} « Vous vous êtes {mf|échappé|échappée} de Commorragh ? C'est un exploit rare. Je vous félicite sincèrement pour cette prouesse hors du commun et je n'entacherai pas votre triomphe en vous expliquant que l'Inquisition vous tiendra bien entendu à l'œil à compter de ce jour. J'espère de tout cœur que votre grande évasion ne faisait pas partie du plan diabolique des xénos. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Der Inquisitor hebt beeindruckt eine Augenbraue.{/n} "Ihr seid aus der Dunklen Stadt entkommen? Das haben nur wenige geschafft. Ich gratuliere Euch ehrlich zu einer herausragenden Leistung und werde Euren Triumph auch nicht dadurch schmälern, dass ich Euch mitteile, dass Ihr von nun an von der Inquisition natürlich sehr genau beobachtet werdet. Ich hoffe wirklich, dass Eure große Flucht nicht Teil der tückischen Pläne der Xenos war."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor raises an eyebrow, impressed.{/n} "You escaped from the Dark City? A feat that few have accomplished. Truly, I congratulate you on an exceptional performance, and I won't even mar your triumph by telling you that the Inquisition will, of course, be watching you very closely henceforth. I sincerely hope that your grand escape was not part of the xenos' devious machinations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Inquisitor hebt beeindruckt eine Augenbraue.{/n} "Ihr seid von Commorragh entkommen? Das haben nur wenige geschafft. Ich gratuliere Euch ehrlich zu einer herausragenden Leistung und werde Euren Triumph auch nicht dadurch schmälern, dass ich Euch mitteile, dass Ihr von nun an von der Inquisition natürlich sehr genau beobachtet werdet. Ich hoffe wirklich, dass Eure große Flucht nicht Teil der tückischen Pläne der Xenos war."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Engizisyoncu bir kaşını kaldırıyor. Belli ki etkilenmiş.{/n} "Kara Şehir'den mi kaçtın yani? Her yiğidin harcı değildir. Bu fevkalade gayretin için seni canıgönülden tebrik ediyorum. Hatta başarını kursağında bırakmamak adına Engizisyon'un bundan böyle her hareketini yakından takip edeceğini söylemekten kaçınacağım. Büyük kaçışının zenoların sinsi desiselerine hizmet etmediğini umuyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor raises an eyebrow, impressed.{/n} "You escaped from the Dark City? A feat that few have accomplished. Truly, I congratulate you on an exceptional performance, and I won't even mar your triumph by telling you that the Inquisition will, of course, be watching you very closely henceforth. I sincerely hope that your grand escape was not part of the xenos' devious machinations."
